tier.item: 63) Þau sýna alltaf viðtöl við Clinton klukkan ellefu.
they show always interviews with Clinton clock eleven
Existential: 'It is always the case that they show interviews with Clinton at 11
o'clock.'
Generic: 'Whenever there are interviews with Clinton, they are always shown at
11 o'clock.'

Everyone considers only Maria to be smart
(Greek; Perlmutter and Soames 1979:162, exx. 28, 29)
